sense.def: Alternative Names zhong bing 腫病 , swelling disease; zhong qi 腫氣 , qi swelling. Pathological Condition of ailments with zhong 腫 , swelling, as its main sign. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 4: 一切腫疾， 悉宜鐮割足小指下橫文間。腫在左則割左，在右則割右，血少出則瘥 , “In all cases of swelling ailment , use a sickle to cut in the horizontal line underneath the small toe. If the swelling is on the left side, cut the left [toe]. If it is on the right side, cut the right [toe]. The cure is achieved when a small amount of blood appears”.
